covered_methods.method_body:
public static final Charset ISO_8859_1 = Charset.forName(CharEncoding.ISO_8859_1); /** * Seven-bit ASCII, also known as ISO646-US, also known as the Basic Latin block of the Unicode character set. *

* Every implementation of the Java platform is required to support this character encoding. *

*

* On Java 7 or later, use {@link java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets#ISO_8859_1} instead.
